show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

header.title: The Vicissitudes Of U.S. Business Failure

title: The Vicissitudes Of U.S. Business Failure
content:
Time was when a business was easy to start in the United States and if it was viable it was likely to be successful. <!--more--> Things are very different today, especially for small businesses.
Some explanations follow.
Why the purchase of real estate is a bad idea.
Loss of innovation in America: the story of the pharmaceutical industry.
A third of the U.
S population have to deal with debt collectors.
76% of the citizenry lives from paycheck-to-paycheck.
Other sobering statistics.
Man shot by police constable while backing his car out of his garage.
SWAT raids out of control in the US The disappearing myth of the American Dream.
